abstract: Augustine "Austin" Amamchukwu Ejide (born 8 April 1984) is a Nigerian football goalkeeper. His name, Amamchukwu, means "Do I know God´s wish?".Born in Onitsha, Anambra State, Ejide has played for Gabros International and SC Bastia in Corsica, which competes in Ligue 2 of the French Football League. He currently plays for Israeli Premier side Hapoel Be'er Sheva.
